column1: The 1st Academy Awards were held in [1] at a private dinner hosted by [2] [2] in The Hollywood Roosevelt Hotel.

At the 1st Academy Awards an actor could be awarded for multiple films: [1] [1] won Best Actor for his work in both The Way of All Flesh and The Last Command, while Best Actress winner [2] [2] was honored for three films.
[1] [1] (abbreviated as [2]) is India's state-owned public broadcaster, headquartered in New Delhi.
